tool.name: ConcoordDisco
tool.description: : Wrapper of the Disco tool from the Concoord package.

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Input structure file in PDB format. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: input_dat_path
param.label: input DAT,TXT file
param.help: Input dat with structure interpretation and bond definitions. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: outname_output_traj_path
param.label: output PDB,XTC,GRO name
param.help: Output trajectory file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_rmsd_path
param.label: output DAT name
param.help: Output rmsd file Format: [output].dat

param.name: outname_output_bfactor_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Output B-factor file Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Concoord disco binary path to be used.

param.name: vdw
param.label: vdw
param.help: Select a set of Van der Waals parameters.
param.option: 6 - OPLS-X parameters -recommended for NMR structure determination-

param.name: num_structs
param.label: num_structs
param.help: Number of structures to be generated

param.name: num_iterations
param.label: num_iterations
param.help: Maximum number of iterations per structure

param.name: chirality_check
param.label: chirality_check
param.help: Chirality check.

param.name: bs
param.label: bs
param.help: Number of rounds of triangular bound smoothing (default 0), (if >= 6, tetragonal BS is activated)

param.name: nofit
param.label: nofit
param.help: Do not fit generated structures to reference

param.name: seed
param.label: seed
param.help: Initial random seed

param.name: violation
param.label: violation
param.help: Maximal acceptable sum of violations (nm)

param.name: convergence
param.label: convergence
param.help: Consider convergence failed after this number of non-productive iterations

param.name: trials
param.label: trials
param.help: Maximum number of trials per run

param.name: damp
param.label: damp
param.help: Damping factor for distance corrections.

param.name: dyn
param.label: dyn
param.help: Number of rounds to dynamically set tolerances

param.name: bump
param.label: bump
param.help: Do extra bump check

param.name: pairlist_freq
param.label: pairlist_freq
param.help: Pairlist update frequency in steps (only valid together with bump)

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff
param.help: Cut-off radius for pairlist (nm) (only valid together with bump)

param.name: ref
param.label: ref
param.help: Use input coordinates instead of random starting coordinates

param.name: scale
param.label: scale
param.help: Pre-scale coordinates with this factor

param.name: output_format
param.label: output_format
param.help: Format of the output file
